input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This cutter is the one you've been looking for. With the top-quality c-2 carbide 3/4-inch bore shaper cutter, double lock miter, and 1-inch cutting length, it can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and even some plastics. It has a speed of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.
input_text.Response B: The Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore is a top-quality shaper cutter designed for wood cutting applications. The grizzy 3/4-inch bore shaper cutters are made of the best available c-2 carbide, shaped, and sharpened with dies. This amazing tool can be used to cut a variety of materials including wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm. The cutting length is 1 inch. The grizzy shaper cutters feature a double lock miter lock system that allows for quick and easy adjustment of the cutting angle. The grizzy shaper cutters are ideal for a wide range of applications including: woodworking, mold making, car drafting, and plastic work.

label_annotations.feedback: The first response is good and concise for people that do not want to read a lot. The second response, which is the one I would prefer really lists the details and assets of the item. They both follow the AIDA framework.
